name: When in Gheltizka
description:
When in Gheltizka

You are trapped with Elisa that you have just met in the ruins. She told you that in order to escape Gheltizka, you need to find all of the artifacts.

Controls:

  • A - to skip when talking
  • SPACE- when going to ladders and interacting

Special thanks to the following:

  • MET Open Access Jam 
  • Pipoya for time magic and emotes 
  • oddpotatogift for tile set 
  • BizmasterStudios for key sprites 
  • wulax for Mathias sprites 
  • Yamilian for Elisa sprites 

Music from https://filmmusic.io

  • "The Other Side of the Door" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com) 
  • "Trio for Piano, Cello, and Clarinet" by Kevin MacLeod 
  • "Midnight Tale" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)

 Made in Godot 3.1
